description:
A deck-building roguelike where you must craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, discover relics of
immense power, and Slay the Spire!

1.16.0-RC-1.description: Initial release for Custom AP World for StS.  This is essentially a carbon copy of the world as it was when it was removed from core earlier this year.  Requires a corresponding version of the mod, located here: https://github.com/cjmang/Slay-The-Spire-Archipelago-Mod
1.16.0-RC-1.title: 1.16.0 Release Candidate

2.0.description:
2.0 release of the StS APWorld.  This AP world is incompatible with the existing mod by Kono, and requires a 2.x release of the mod from https://github.com/cjmang/Slay-The-Spire-Archipelago-Mod/releases.  Please see the release notes on the mod page for details of changes.

## Important
Note that this is now a custom world, and not in core.

For AP releases pre 0.6.2, you will need to remove the existing StS world in core.  This can be done by navigating to your AP install location, and in the `lib/worlds` folder, deleting/moving the `spire` folder out of there.

For all AP releases you will need to install the `spire.apworld` file into your Archipelago installation's `custom_worlds` folder.  You can find said apworld in the assets of this release.

For the setup guide, please go to https://github.com/cjmang/StS-AP-World/blob/sts/worlds/spire/docs/slay-the-spire_en.md.
2.0.title: 2.0 Release

**Important**
Note that this is now a custom world, and not in core.

- Fixed an issue where AP Events ended up in Location and Item Groups.
- Fixed an issue where the world was improperly counting the number of shop locations depending on configuration.

2.2.1.description:
2.2.1 release of the StS APWorld. This AP world requires a 2.x release of the mod from https://github.com/cjmang/Slay-The-Spire-Archipelago-Mod/releases.

This update only changes two things:
1. The default YAML has been updated to be a bit more beginner friendly.
2. The setting `locked_characters` should now show up on webhost (when that's relevant).

Given the changes, from a generation perspective this isn't any different from 2.2.0.

For all AP releases you will need to install the spire.apworld file into your Archipelago installation's custom_worlds folder. You can find said apworld in the assets of this release.

For the setup guide, please go to https://github.com/cjmang/StS-AP-World/blob/sts/worlds/spire/docs/slay-the-spire_en.md.
2.2.1.title: 2.2.1 Release

2.3.0.title: 2.3.0 Release

2.3.1.description:
2.3.1 patch release of the StS APWorld. This AP world requires a 2.x release of the mod from https://github.com/cjmang/Slay-The-Spire-Archipelago-Mod/releases.  

### Changes
1. Fixed a generation crash when provided an empty `trap_weights` option.
2. Fixed various missed items related to adding support for the Awakened One.
3. Officially renamed the `character` option in favor of the `characters` option.  YAMLs using the previous option will no longer generate (but I trust the reader can add the 's').

For all AP releases you will need to install the spire.apworld file into your Archipelago installation's custom_worlds folder. You can find said apworld in the assets of this release.

For the setup guide, please go to https://github.com/cjmang/StS-AP-World/blob/sts/worlds/spire/docs/slay-the-spire_en.md.
2.3.1.title: 2.3.1 Patch Release
